doc.title: The Illumination
doc.plot: On the Western Front in 1918, during what was to have been the "war to end all wars," two veteran war correspondents and one woman, a surgeon for the RAMC, meet at an Allied camp near Amiens, forging a friendship which transcends nationality, surviving the harrowing nature of a war which would devastate an entire generation. Based on The Illumination: A Novel of the Great War (2006) - Book/Film Interview: http://www.manitoupr.com/IlluminationInterview.pdf
